properties.decription: This is where we departed from Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province and went to Wuzhen, Zhejiang Province by bus.

This is where we 5 guys arrived in Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province from Guangzhou,Guangdong Province by train.We were so excited because it is our first time traveled by train. And this journey was planned all by ourselves!!!

This causeway was built in The Song Dynasty (1090) organized by Su Dongpo, who is the one of the most influential poets in China. This causeway is in about 3 kilometers length.
We went through it by walk!!! And this photo was taken at the end of the causeway.

properties.place: The Three Pools Mirroring the Moon
properties.decription: This is the biggest island in the west lake.The scene of three pinnacles is very famous, which is printed on the back of 1RMB.We got a close look of these 3 pinnacles by taking a small boat. However, this photo just show one of the three pinnalcles.

The West Lake is one of the most famous places for tourism to visit in Hangzhou. It contains many beauties to visit. This time we just have visited few of them. They are: Three Pools Mirroring the MoonìSu Causewayì and Yuefei Temple.
This is where buried Yuefeiì who is a famous general in Song Dynasty.
